title: The story of YouTube; Federal bill would ban the practice of putting lyrics on trial
description: Bloomberg tech reporter Mark Bergen joins us to talk about his book "Like, Comment, Subscribe: Inside YouTube's Chaotic Rise to World Domination." And, Rep. Jamaal Bowman, a Democrat from New York, talks about the federal bill that would ban the use of song lyrics as evidence in court.
itunes:title: The story of YouTube; Federal bill would ban the practice of putting lyrics on trial
itunes:author: NPR
